description: 本課程介紹作業系統較基本的一些觀念，包括硬體結構，行程，排程，同步與死結，記憶體管理等等。

syllabus.zh:
1. Introduction作業系統簡介
2. 硬體結構
CPU, Memory, Caching, I/O Interrupt, DMA, Dual-Mode, I/O Protection,
CPU Protection, Memory Protection
3. 作業系統結構
System Components, Services, System Call, Virtual Machine
4. Process行程
PCB, Scheduling, Context Switch, Process and Thread, Buffer, Synchronization
5. Scheduling排程
排程準則, FCFS, SJF, Priority, Round-Robin
6. Synchronization and Dealock同步與死結
Critical Section, Bakery Algorithm, Semaphore, Deadlock Detection,
Deadlock Prevention, Banker's Algorithm
7. Memory Management記憶體管理
Swapping, Allocation, Paging
8. Virtual Memory虛擬記憶體
Page Replacement, FIFO, Optimal, LRU, LFU, MFU, Page Fault
syllabus.en:
1. Introduction
2. Hardware Structures
CPU, Memory, Caching, I/O Interrupt, DMA, Dual-Mode, I/O Protection,
CPU Protection, Memory Protection
3. Operating System Structures
System Components, Services, System Call, Virtual Machine
4. Process
PCB, Scheduling, Context Switch, Process and Thread, Buffer, Synchronization
5. Scheduling
Scheduling Criteria, FCFS, SJF, Priority, Round-Robin
6. Synchronization and Dealock
Critical Section, Bakery Algorithm, Semaphore, Deadlock Detection,
Deadlock Prevention, Banker's Algorithm
7. Memory Management
Swapping, Allocation, Paging
8. Virtual Memory
Page Replacement, FIFO, Optimal, LRU, LFU, MFU, Page Fault

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 2.能應用基本學理分析探索作業系統問題
3.能將所學透過課程練習與同儕相互檢核講解以發展溝通表達能力
4.能出席課程並參與練習以建立責任與倫理的涵養
